name: Keep Distance!
description:
STORY! (Read down here)

When you play, you are helping Robert a old man that uses wheelchair to draw money from the bank. Because of the coronavirus is crisis time and the government recommend be distanced while making lines, and every time... So you have to keep distance in the line,  it's laaaarge. Hope you get in on time! If you get to close to the person in front you lose time.

Stay home! Together we can flatten the curve! If you really need to go outside keep distance.

PD: Sorry about having the story here, but I failed to manage the time, the original idea was to make cutscenes or some kind of "in game" story, because I believe that the message of staying home, and also help the others to make it. If is necessary go out keep distance is important.

Best wishes! Stay safe and healthy!

Cheers Isma
